import React, { useState } from "react" export default function About() { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false) const [name, setName] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [message, setMessage] = useState("") const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setShowModal(false) } return (

I'm Luky.

Hello, my nickname is Luky, a Freelance Illustrator/Animator based in France. With a passion in web development.
